description:
Pixel Game Maker Series LAB" is a mystery horror adventure game in which the main character (a fox) wakes up in an empty facility and explores it without knowing his situation.

Why is there no one in the facility?
Who is the invisible enemy?
Get information from the remaining PCs and solve the mystery of what happened in the facility.

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switchâ„¢.
name: Pixel Game Maker Series LAB
intro:
What happened in the facility where people disappeared?
Mystery horror adventure game!
